Apple's old MKMapView offers the most complete starting point for cross-platform map visualization but offers little more.

| Name                   | Swift | macOS | iOS | Custom Geometry | Raster Overlay |
| ---------------------- | ----- | ----- | --- |-----------------|----------------|
| Apple Maps - SwiftUI   | YES   | YES   | YES | YES             | NO             |
| Apple Maps - MKMapView | YES   | YES   | YES | YES             | YES            |
| Whirly Globe           | ~     | ~     | YES | YES             | YES
| MapLibre               | ~     | NO    | YES |
| MapBox                 | YES   | NO    | YES |
| Here                   |       |       |     |
| ESRI                   | YES   | NO    | YES |
